name: John McCain
quote: "Praying for all impacted by horrific shooting in Sutherland Springs TX and grateful to officers & 1st responders for their courageous action."

name: Richard Burr
quote: "Praying for those affected in the unspeakable tragedy at the First Baptist Church in Sutherland Springs, TX."

name: Marco Rubio
quote: "We pray for the Sutherland Springs community in this difficult time. So incredibly thankful to the first responders"

name: Roy Blunt
quote: "My prayers are with the victims of the heartbreaking tragedy in Sutherland Springs"

name: Thom Tillis
quote: "My prayers are with the First Baptist Church and the community of Sutherland Springs TX. "

name: Cory Gardner
quote: "Our hearts are with the people of Sutherland Springs, TX during this tragedy & thank you to our first responders & emergency personnel."

name: Rob Portman
quote: "Jane & I are devastated by the news out of Sutherland Springs, Texas. We send our prayers to that community & first responders at the scene"

name: Todd Young
quote: "Heartbroken by the news out of Sutherland Springs, Texas. Praying for the victims and their families."

name: Bill Cassidy
quote: "Our prayers are with everyone affected by the tragic event in Sutherland Springs, Texas."
